description:
Area Vice President of Sales

About the Company

Prominent organization selling professional services & solutions

Industry
Consumer Services

Type
Privately Held

About the Role

The Area Vice President of Sales will be responsible for overseeing the development and execution of an effective sales strategy to gain new accounts and managing a wide and deep sales pipeline including database creation.

Travel Percent
Less than 10%

Functions
• Sales/Revenue
• Account Management/Optimization

Known Requirements
• Bachelor's degree in the relevant field required
• Over 5 years' experience in a B2B or staffing sales role and proven track record of successfully closing deals required
• Superior leadership skills and prior experience solving complex problems and building diverse teams required
• Excellent technical skills and advanced proficiency in google, shared drives, and calendaring required
